attribs.name: strength_check_mod_formula
attribs.current: 0[str mod with bonus] + 1[jack of all trades] + (@{global_check_bonus})[global check bonus]

attribs.name: dexterity_check_mod_formula
attribs.current: 2[dex mod with bonus] + 1[jack of all trades] + (@{global_check_bonus})[global check bonus]

attribs.name: constitution_check_mod_formula
attribs.current: 1[con mod with bonus] + 1[jack of all trades] + (@{global_check_bonus})[global check bonus]

attribs.name: intelligence_check_mod_formula
attribs.current: 1[int mod with bonus] + 1[jack of all trades] + (@{global_check_bonus})[global check bonus]

attribs.name: wisdom_check_mod_formula
attribs.current: -1[wis mod with bonus] + 1[jack of all trades] + (@{global_check_bonus})[global check bonus]

attribs.name: charisma_check_mod_formula
attribs.current: 3[cha mod with bonus] + 1[jack of all trades] + (@{global_check_bonus})[global check bonus]

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo34mff2UjSUAamTZ_freetext
attribs.current:
You can inspire others through stirring words or music. To do so, you use a bonus action on your turn to choose one creature other than yourself within 60 feet of you who can hear you. That creature gains one Bardic Inspiration die, a d8.
Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes. The creature can wait until after it rolls the d20 before deciding to use the Bardic Inspiration die, but must decide before the GM says whether the roll succeeds or fails. Once the Bardic Inspiration die is rolled, it is lost. A creature can have only one Bardic Inspiration die at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo34mff2UjSUAamTZ_display_text

Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes. The creature can wait until after it rolls the d20 before deciding to use the Bardic Inspiration die, but must decide before the GM says whether the roll succeeds or fails. Once the Bardic Inspiration die is rolled, it is lost. A creature can have only one Bardic Inspiration die at a time.

attribs.current: {{Traits=[Bardic Inspiration](~repeating_trait_-khto34mff2ujsuaamtz_trait)}}{{Traits=[Bardic Inspiration](~repeating_trait_-khto34mff2ujsuaamtz_trait), [Jack of All Trades](~repeating_trait_-khto6iukjvfmmvkkmln_trait)}}{{Traits=[Bardic Inspiration](~repeating_trait_-khto34mff2ujsuaamtz_trait), [Jack of All Trades](~repeating_trait_-khto6iukjvfmmvkkmln_trait), [Song of Rest](~repeating_trait_-khto6iwksknutav4pmg_trait)}}{{Traits=[Bardic Inspiration](~repeating_trait_-khto34mff2ujsuaamtz_trait), [Jack of All Trades](~repeating_trait_-khto6iukjvfmmvkkmln_trait), [Song of Rest](~repeating_trait_-khto6iwksknutav4pmg_trait), [Expertise](~repeating_trait_-khto6ix2ijs29p0eknr_trait)}}{{Traits=[Bardic Inspiration](~repeating_trait_-khto34mff2ujsuaamtz_trait), [Jack of All Trades](~repeating_trait_-khto6iukjvfmmvkkmln_trait), [Song of Rest](~repeating_trait_-khto6iwksknutav4pmg_trait), [Expertise](~repeating_trait_-khto6ix2ijs29p0eknr_trait), [Countercharm](~repeating_trait_-khto6izxoplmmrwcyn5_trait)}}

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo6iUKjVFmmvkkMLN_freetext
attribs.current: You can add half your proficiency bonus, rounded down, to any ability check you make that doesn't already include your proficiency bonus.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo6iUKjVFmmvkkMLN_display_text
attribs.current: You can add half your proficiency bonus, rounded down, to any ability check you make that doesn't already include your proficiency bonus.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo6iWKskNUTaV4pMg_freetext
attribs.current: You can use soothing music or oration to help revitalize your wounded allies during a short rest. If you or any friendly creatures who can hear your performance regain hit points at the end of the short rest by spending one or more Hit Dice, each of those creatures regains extra hit points.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo6iWKskNUTaV4pMg_display_text
attribs.current: You can use soothing music or oration to help revitalize your wounded allies during a short rest. If you or any friendly creatures who can hear your performance regain hit points at the end of the short rest by spending one or more Hit Dice, each of those creatures regains extra hit points.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo6iX2ijs29p0ekNR_freetext
attribs.current:
Choose two of your skill proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.
At 10th level, you can choose another two skill proficiencies to gain this benefit.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo6iX2ijs29p0ekNR_display_text
attribs.current:
Choose two of your skill proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.
At 10th level, you can choose another two skill proficiencies to gain this benefit.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo6iZXOplMmRwCYn5_freetext
attribs.current: You gain the ability to use musical notes or words of power to disrupt mind-influencing effects. As an action, you can start a performance that lasts until the end of your next turn. During that time, you and any friendly creatures within 30 feet of you have advantage on saving throws against being frightened or charmed. A creature must be able to hear you to gain this benefit. The performance ends early if you are incapacitated or silenced or if you voluntarily end it (no action required).

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHTo6iZXOplMmRwCYn5_display_text
attribs.current: You gain the ability to use musical notes or words of power to disrupt mind-influencing effects. As an action, you can start a performance that lasts until the end of your next turn. During that time, you and any friendly creatures within 30 feet of you have advantage on saving throws against being frightened or charmed. A creature must be able to hear you to gain this benefit. The performance ends early if you are incapacitated or silenced or if you voluntarily end it (no action required).
